attributes.action: To stop Southend-on-Sea council from wasting the Leigh skate park site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Leigh on sea skate park a.k.a "Rampage" was a national treasure for skateboarding.
The site is to be redeveloped. However the council rather than creating a skateboard park that would equal or better the old one are to use this site as basketball courts and football pitches with a small depressing skateboard park attached.
